price: Nyankopͻn kaa sε: “Firi hͻ kͻ wͻ animguaseε mu, yɛayi wo adi. Nokorε sε, wͻn mu biara a ͻbɛdi w’akyi no, Mede mo nyinaa bεhyε Ogya no mu ma.
arabic: قَالَ ٱخۡرُجۡ مِنۡهَا مَذۡءُومٗا مَّدۡحُورٗاۖ لَّمَن تَبِعَكَ مِنۡهُمۡ لَأَمۡلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنكُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla ukh'ruj min'hā madhūman madḥūran laman tabiʿaka min'hum la-amla-anna jahannama minkum ajmaʿīna
